title: I cant remember my sign up email
body: Hi I am trying to remember the email address that i used to make my account and I can not remember what it is. is there any way to check it?

replies.body: While not knowing the email address or Username makes the process much more difficult, it isn't impossible!  Make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our Account Recovery Specialists should be able to help out!
I also can not remember my username to log into my account. all I know is the summoner name. how do i find out the username? and email address?
